name: Shreya kumari

full_output.summary: Computer Science graduate with a solid foundation in machine learning, data analysis, and software engineering. Seeking an entry-level role to apply my Python programming skills, knowledge of data structures and algorithms, and hands-on experience with machine learning frameworks to drive innovation and contribute to impactful projects

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

projects.name: Event Management System
projects.description: The Event Management System is designed to automate and streamline the entire lifecycle of event planning, execution, and post-event evaluation. The system serves both event organizers and attendees, facilitating seamless coordination and communication.

projects.name: Chest X Ray detection using Transfer Learning
projects.description: The goal is to create a system that uses transfer learning to detect pneumonia from chest X-ray images. Pneumonia, a severe lung infection, requires early detection for effective treatment. However, manual analysis of X-ray images is time-consuming and prone to errors. Transfer learning, leveraging pre-trained models, can efficiently solve this task.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Developed many different clone sites using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap.

experiences.description: Assisted in data collection, cleaning, and preprocessing to ensure high-quality datasets for analysis. Conducted exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify patterns, trends, and relationships within the data. Developed and implemented machine learning models to solve business problems, such as predictive analytics and classification tasks.
